column2: 5 pups from this litter had colored tails that were cleaned off by female so the pup could be engrafted by 3541 or 21238;
During necropsy, this mice had enlarged brains which corresponds with 3/5 pups that were engrafted 3541, therefore it is very good chance that this mouse was grafted with 3541
A piece of brain was collected to start tumor sphere culture, the rest was fixed for IHC.
